steps: Learn how Emirati Arabic pronounces ق as 'g' and ج as 'y/ch'
Do focused audio practice on ق and ج
Record yourself saying: اشحالك؟ / اشحالج؟
Take a speaking challenge using Emirati greetings
Practice gendered forms like اشحالك vs اشحالج
Review expressions like دايماً and مشغول in context
Listen and repeat greetings like أنا يايا
Respond to common Emirati phrases like الله يقومج بالسلامة
Identify common Emirati food words like يوعانة and مجبوس دياي
Listen to culturally rich sentences like يارنا طرش النا صحن هريس
Review correct verb usage with food (e.g., أتغدى not أريد)
Practice with emoji/emotion-based food expressions 🥰
Understand expressions like تعال باجر and بطلع الحين
Practice common phrases for safe travels: تروحون و تردون بالسلامة
Answer true/false time questions confidently
Build short dialogue about future plans using Emirati time words
Say polite requests: ممكن الفاتورة لو سمحتي؟
Identify items and their value: شيء غالي (diamond)
Listen and repeat shopping phrases: ماما متى بتشترين لي تلفون يديد؟
Use shopping context to ask, compare, and request things
Translate common office actions like طرش إيميل لأحمد
Practice sentence reordering: طرش إيميل وقول له إن الاجتماع تأجل
Compare Emirati vs MSA in professional context
Record yourself using office-related Emirati expressions
